    • walkNearCell

      public int walkNearCell​(Cell c1, Cell c2)
      method walkNearCell
      Parameters:
      c1 - is the cell c1(x1,y1).
      c2 - is the cell c2(x2,y2).
      Returns:
      the max module between the difference of every coordinate (x,y) when i must move my pawn.
